title: Samara Weaving oozes sass in bold orange jumper and gym leggings in Beverly Hills
text:
She's the jaw-dropping Australian actress who never puts a foot wrong when it comes to fashion.

And Samara Weaving certainly cut a stylish figure as she headed out for lunch with pals in Beverly Hills, Los Angeles this week.

The former Home and Away star, 27, looked effortlessly chic in a bright orange hoodie and casual black leggings, which highlighted her slender pins and tiny waist.

Hollywood starlet: Former Home and Away star Samara Weaving (pictured) looked effortlessly chic in a bright orange jumper and black gym leggings

The blonde bombshell whisked her peroxide locks into a slicked-back ponytail, parading her natural beauty by wearing barely any make-up on her stunning visage.

Samara, who is the niece of The Matrix actor Hugo Weaving, teamed her look with a pair of eye-catching trainers and a black handbag for her essentials.

She soon spotted her pal, a mystery brunette female, and the pair took a seat at Joan's On Third for a swift lunch.

Natural beauty: The blonde bombshell whisked her peroxide locks into a slicked-back ponytail, parading her natural beauty by wearing barely any make-up

Lunch date! Samara was joined by a mystery brunette as she enjoyed a bite to eat at Joan's On Third in Beverly Hills

The lunch date comes just days after Samara announced she'd landed a huge Hollywood film role, following the success of her latest movie, Ready or Not.

Samara has signed on to play Scarlett in Paramount’s G.I. Joe film series spin-off, Snake Eyes, alongside Crazy Rich Asians star Henry Golding.

Ready or Not had made an incredible $48 million return out of a $6 million budget.

Keeping it stylish: Samara, who is the niece of The Matrix actor Hugo Weaving, teamed her look with a pair of eye-catching black trainers and a black handbag for her essentials

The Adelaide born actress was incredibly excited to announced the news, sharing a related article on her Instagram page.

'Gotta get some muscles now,' Samara, who is engaged to creative producer Jimmy Warden, captioned the post.

Writer Alex Winter, who worked with Samara and Keanu Reeves in the upcoming Bill and Ted 3, offered his congratulations to the actress.
description: Samara Weaving certainly cut a stylish figure as she headed out for lunch with pals in Los Angeles this week, after landing a huge Hollywood movie role.
authors: Nicole Douglas For Daily Mail Australia
